remark.p: First Secretary of the Embassy in Iran until January 15, 1953; Officer in Charge of Egypt and Anglo–Egyptian Sudan Affairs, Office of Near Eastern Affairs, Bureau of Near Eastern, South Asian, and African Affairs, Department of State, from March 2, 1953.

Deputy Director, Office of Near Eastern Affairs, Bureau of Near Eastern, South Asian, and African Affairs, Department of State, October 9, 1955–October 7, 1956; Special Assistant to the Assistant Secretary of State for Near Eastern, South Asian, and African Affairs, October 7, 1956–August 11, 1957; Acting Deputy Director, Office of Near Eastern Affairs, August 11–November 3, 1957; thereafter First Secretary of the Embassy in the United Kingdom

Deputy Director, Office of Near Eastern Affairs, Department of State, October 9, 1955–October 7, 1956; Special Assistant to the Assistant Secretary of State for Near Eastern, South Asian, and African Affairs, October 7, 1956–August 11, 1957

Special Assistant to the Assistant Secretary of State for Near Eastern, South Asian, and African Affairs, October 7, 1956-August 11, 1957; Acting Depuyty Director, Office of Near Eastern Affairs, August 11, 1957-August 28, 1957; First Secretary of the Embassy in the United Kingdom from November 3, 1957

Officer in Charge, Egypt and Anglo-Sudan Affairs, Department of State, until October 1955; Deputy Director, Bureau of Near Eastern, South Asian, and African Affairs, October 1955–October 1956; Special Assistant to the Assistant Secretary of State for Near Eastern, South Asian, and African Affairs, October 1956–November 1957
Director, Office of British Commonwealth and Northern European Affairs, Bureau of European Affairs, Department of State, from September 1960

Director of the Office of British Commonwealth and Northern European Affairs, Bureau of European Affairs, Department of State, until September 1962; thereafter Deputy Assistant Secretary of State for European Affairs
Director of the Office of British Commonwealth and Northern European Affairs, Bureau of European Affairs, Department of State
Director, Office of British Commonwealth and Northern European Affairs, Bureau of European Affairs, Department of State, until September 1, 1962

Director, Office of British Commonwealth and Northern European Affairs, Bureau of European Affairs, Department of State, until September 1962; thereafter Deputy Assistant Secretary of State for European Affairs

Deputy Director, Office of British Commonwealth and Northern European Affairs, Bureau of European Affairs, Department of State, until September 1962; thereafter Deputy Assistant Secretary of State for European Affairs

Officer in Charge of Egypt and Anglo-Egyptian Sudan Affairs, Office of Near Eastern Affairs, Department of State, until October 9, 1955; Deputy Director, Office of Near Eastern Affairs, October 9, 1955–October 7, 1956; Special Assistant to the Assistant Secretary of State for Near Eastern, South Asian, and African Affairs, October 7, 1956–August 11, 1957; Acting Deputy Director, Office of Near “Eastern Affairs”, August 11–November 3, 1957

Officer in Charge of Egypt and Anglo-Egyptian Sudan Affairs, Office of Near Eastern Affairs, Department of State, until October 9, 1955; Deputy Director, Office of Near Eastern Affairs, October 9, 1955–October 7, 1956; Special Assistant to the Assistant Secretary of State for Near Eastern, South Asian, and African Affairs, October 7, 1956–August 11, 1957; Acting Deputy Director, Office of Near Eastern Affairs, August 11–November 3, 1957

Officer in Charge of Egypt and Anglo–Egyptian Sudan Affairs, Office of Near Eastern Affairs, Department of State, until October 9, 1955; Deputy Director, Office of Near Eastern Affairs, October 9, 1955–October 7, 1956; Special Assistant to the Assistant Secretary of State for Near Eastern, South Asian, and African Affairs, October 7, 1956–August 11, 1957; Acting Deputy Director, Office of Near Eastern Affairs, August 11–November 3, 1957; thereafter First Secretary of the Embassy in the United Kingdom

Officer in Charge of Egypt and Anglo-Egyptian Sudan Affairs, Office of Near Eastern Affairs, Department of State, until October 9, 1955; Deputy Director, Office of Near Eastern Affairs, October 9, 1955–October 7, 1956; Special Assistant to the Assistant Secretary of State for Near Eastern, South Asian, and African Affairs, October 7, 1956–August 11, 1957; Acting Deputy Director, Office of Near Eastern Affairs, August 11–November 3, 1957; thereafter First Secretary of the Embassy in the United Kingdom

Director of the Office of British Commonwealth and Northern European Affairs, Bureau of European Affairs, Department of State, until September 1962; Deputy Assistant Secretary of State for European Affairs thereafter

Director of the Office of British Commonwealth and Northern European Affairs, Bureau of European Affairs, Department of State, until September 1962; thereafter Deputy Assistant Secretary of State of European Affairs
Deputy Assistant Secretary of State for European Affairs from September 1962
Deputy Assistant Secretary of State for European Affairs until June 1964
Deputy Assistant Secretary of State for European Affairs to June 1964
Deputy Assistant Secretary of State for European Affairs from January 1964
Foreign Service Officer. Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (Malawi).
